Example.Name: ADC_DualModeInterleaved_Example
Example.Description: This example provides a short description of how to use the ADC peripheral to convert a regular channel in Dual interleaved mode using DMA in mode 3 with 5Msps. DMA mode 3 is used in interleaved mode in 6-bit and 8-bit resolutions. The Dual interleaved delay is configured 6 ADC clk cycles. On each DMA request (two data items are available) two bytes representing two ADC-converted data items are transferred as a half word. The data transfer order is similar to that of the DMA mode 2.
